Name: MEDIA_Intent
Description: The MEDIA SLU dataset is a French dataset distributed by ELRA, mainly used by the French research community, for Spoken Language Understanding. The dataset consists of recorded phone calls for hotel booking.
Paper Title: New Semantic Task for the French Spoken Language Understanding MEDIA Benchmark
Abstract: Intent classification and slot-filling are essential tasks of Spoken Language Understanding (SLU). In most SLU systems, those tasks are realized by independent modules. A multilingual module using a joint model was envisioned to create a touristic dialoguesystem for a European project, HumanE-AI-Net. A combination of multiple datasets, includingthe MEDIA dataset, was suggested for training this joint model. The MEDIA SLU datasetis a French dataset distributed since 2005 by ELRA, mainly used by the French research community and free for academic research since 2020. Unfortunately,it is annotatedonly in slots but not intents. An enhanced version of MEDIA annotated with intents has been built to extend its use to more tasks and use cases. This paper presents the semi-automatic methodology used to obtain this enhanced version. In addition, we present the first results of SLU experiments on this enhanced dataset using joint models for intent classification and slot-filling.
